resourceRoot: This app is served from the resource root 'DEPLOYMENT'. This is the folder 'Deployment' [French].
cacheBusterMode: This app uses cache busting on resource level. So you as an application user do not have to clear the browser cache after a server side software update [French].
contentNegotiation: This app uses content negotiation to present language dependent texts. Cache busting on repository level is used here [French].
icmCache: I use the ICM cache of SAP NetWeaver ABAP. Confirm the kernel and web dispatcher patches to support the Vary http response header have been installed [French].
